00017 package WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::AddUsers;
00018 use base qw(WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor);
00019 
00020 =head1 NAME
00021 
00022 WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::AddUsers - Menu interface for adding users
00023 
00024 
00025 =cut
00026 
00027 use strict;
00028 use warnings;
00029 #use CGI qw(-nosticky );
00030 use WeBWorK::CGI;
00031 use WeBWorK::Utils qw/cryptPassword trim_spaces/;
00032 
00033 sub initialize {
00034     my ($self) = @_;
00035     my $r = $self->r;
00036     my $db = $r->db;
00037     my $ce = $r->ce;
00038     my $authz = $r->authz;
00039     
00040     my $user = $r->param('user');
00041     
00042     # Check permissions
00043     return unless ($authz->hasPermissions($user, "access_instructor_tools"));
00044     return unless ($authz->hasPermissions($user, "modify_student_data"));
00045     
00046     if (defined($r->param('addStudents'))) {
00047         my @userIDs;
00048         my $numberOfStudents    = $r->param('number_of_students');
00049         warn "Internal error -- the number of students to be added has not been included" unless defined $numberOfStudents;
00050         foreach my $i (1..$numberOfStudents) {
00051             my $new_user_id  = trim_spaces($r->param("new_user_id_$i"));
00052             my $new_password = cryptPassword($r->param("student_id_$i"));
00053             next unless defined($new_user_id) and $new_user_id;
00054             push @userIDs, $new_user_id;
00055             
00056             my $newUser            = $db->newUser;
00057             my $newPermissionLevel = $db->newPermissionLevel;
00058             my $newPassword        = $db->newPassword;
00059             $newUser->user_id($new_user_id);
00060             $newPermissionLevel->user_id($new_user_id);
00061             $newPassword->user_id($new_user_id);
00062             $newPassword->password($new_password);
00063             $newUser->last_name(trim_spaces($r->param("last_name_$i")));
00064             $newUser->first_name(trim_spaces($r->param("first_name_$i")));
00065             $newUser->student_id(trim_spaces($r->param("student_id_$i")));
00066             $newUser->email_address(trim_spaces($r->param("email_address_$i")));
00067             $newUser->section(trim_spaces($r->param("section_$i")));
00068             $newUser->recitation(trim_spaces($r->param("recitation_$i")));
00069             $newUser->comment(trim_spaces($r->param("comment_$i")));
00070             $newUser->status($ce->status_name_to_abbrevs($ce->{default_status}));
00071             $newPermissionLevel->permission(0);
00072             #FIXME  handle errors if user exists already
00073             eval { $db->addUser($newUser) };
00074             if ($@) {
00075                 my $addError = $@;
00076                 $self->{studentEntryReport} .= join("",
00077                     CGI::b("Failed to enter student: "), $newUser->last_name, ", ",$newUser->first_name,
00078                     CGI::b(", login/studentID: "), $newUser->user_id, "/",$newUser->student_id,
00079                     CGI::b(", email: "), $newUser->email_address,
00080                     CGI::b(", section: "), $newUser->section,
00081                     CGI::br(), CGI::b("Error message: "), $addError,
00082                     CGI::hr(),CGI::br(),
00083                 );
00084             } else {
00085                 $db->addPermissionLevel($newPermissionLevel);
00086                 $db->addPassword($newPassword);
00087                 $self->{studentEntryReport} .= join("",
00088                     CGI::b("Entered student: "), $newUser->last_name, ", ",$newUser->first_name,
00089                     CGI::b(", login/studentID: "), $newUser->user_id, "/",$newUser->student_id,
00090                     CGI::b(", email: "), $newUser->email_address,
00091                     CGI::b(", section: "), $newUser->section,CGI::hr(),CGI::br(),
00092 
00093                 );
00094             }
00095         }
00096         if (defined $r->param("assignSets")) {
00097             my @setIDs = $r->param("assignSets");
00098             if (@setIDs) {
00099                 $self->assignSetsToUsers(\@setIDs, \@userIDs);
00100             }
00101         }
00102     }
00103 }
00104 
00105 sub body {
00106     my ($self) = @_;
00107     my $r      = $self->r;
00108     my $ce     = $r->ce;
00109     my $db     = $r->db;
00110     my $authz  = $r->authz;
00111     
00112     my $courseName = $r->urlpath->arg("courseID");
00113     my $authen_args = $self->url_authen_args();
00114     my $user = $r->param('user');
00115     
00116     # Check permissions
00117     return CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"}, "You are not authorized to access the Instructor tools.")
00118         unless $authz->hasPermissions($user, "access_instructor_tools");
00119     
00120     return CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"}, "You are not authorized to modify student data.")
00121         unless $authz->hasPermissions($user, "modify_student_data");
00122 
00123     
00124     return join("", 
00125     
00126         CGI::hr(),
00127         CGI::p(
00128             defined($self->{studentEntryReport})
00129                 ? $self->{studentEntryReport}
00130                 : ''
00131         ),
00132         CGI::p("Enter information below for students you wish to add. Each student's password will initially be set to their student ID."),
00133         $self->addStudentForm,
00134     );
00135 }
00136 
00137 sub addStudentForm {
00138     my $self                  = shift;
00139     my $r                     = $self->r;
00140     my $db                    = $r->db;
00141     my $ce                    = $r->ce;
00142     my $numberOfStudents      = $r->param("number_of_students") || 5;
00143     
00144 
00145     
00146     # Add a student form
00147     
00148     my @entryLines = ();
00149     foreach my $i (1..$numberOfStudents) {
00150         push( @entryLines,      
00151             CGI::Tr({},
00152                 CGI::td({},
00153                     [ CGI::input({name=>"last_name_$i"}),
00154                       CGI::input({name=>"first_name_$i"}),
00155                       CGI::input({name=>"student_id_$i",size=>"16"}),
00156                       CGI::input({name=>"new_user_id_$i",size=>"10"}),
00157                       CGI::input({name=>"email_address_$i"}),
00158                       CGI::input({name=>"section_$i",size=>"10"}),
00159                       CGI::input({name=>"recitation_$i",size=>"10"}),
00160                       CGI::input({name=>"comment_$i"}),
00161                     ]
00162                 )
00163             ),"\n",
00164         );
00165     }
00166 
00167     return join("",     
00168         CGI::start_form({method=>"post", action=>$r->uri(),name=>"add_users"}),
00169         $self->hidden_authen_fields(),"\n",
00170         CGI::submit(-name=>"Create", -value=>"Create"),"&nbsp;&nbsp;","\n",
00171         CGI::input({type=>'text', name=>'number_of_students', value=>$numberOfStudents,size => 3}), " entry rows. ","\n",
00172         CGI::end_form(),"\n",
00173         CGI::hr(),
00174         
00175         CGI::start_form({method=>"post", action=>$r->uri()}),
00176         $self->hidden_authen_fields(),
00177         CGI::input({type=>'hidden', name => "number_of_students", value => $numberOfStudents}),
00178         CGI::start_table({border=>'1', cellpadding=>'2'}),
00179         CGI::Tr({},
00180             CGI::th({},
00181                 ['Last Name', 'First Name', 'Student ID', 'Login Name', 'Email Address', 'Section','Recitation', 'Comment']
00182             )
00183         ),
00184         @entryLines,
00185         CGI::end_table(),    
00186         
00187 
00188         
00189         CGI::p("Select sets below to assign them to the newly-created users."),
00190         CGI::popup_menu(
00191             -name     => "assignSets",
00192             -values   => [ $db->listGlobalSets ],
00193             -size     => 10,
00194             -multiple => "multiple",
00195         ),
00196         CGI::p(
00197             CGI::submit({name=>"addStudents", value=>"Add Students"}),
00198         ),
00199         CGI::end_form(),        
00200 
00201         #qq{ <div style="color:red"> After entering new students you will still 
00202         #need to assign sets to them.  This is done from the "set list" page. <br> 
00203         #Click on the entry "xx users" in 
00204         #the "assigned to" column at the far right. <br> Then click either "assign to all"  
00205         #or check individual users and click "save" at the bottom.  </div>
00206         #Soon ( real soon -- honest!!! :-)  ) you will also be able to assign sets to the students as they are entered from this page. }
00207     );
00208 }
